mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT invoice.invoice_req_serial_no, buyer_name, invoice_amount, LEFT(invoice.create_time, 16) invoice_time, CASE code WHEN '0000' THEN '1' ELSE '0' END invoice_status FROM cc_ei_blue invoice JOIN cc_ei_blue_items item ON invoice.invoice_req_serial_no = item.invoice_req_serial_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT code, invoice_req_serial_no FROM cc_ei_blue_push outPush WHERE create_time = ( SELECT MAX(create_time) FROM cc_ei_blue_push WHERE invoice_req_serial_no = outPush.invoice_req_serial_no )) push ON invoice.invoice_req_serial_no = push.invoice_req_serial_no LEFT JOIN cc_ei_tradeno_serialno no_in ON invoice.invoice_req_serial_no = no_in.invoice_req_serial_no WHERE no_in.trade_no = #{tradeNo}
